```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(vultureUtils)
library(move)
library(igraph)
```

Download some data from 2020-present to mess around with
```{r}
base::load("movebankCredentials/pw.Rda")
MB.LoginObject <- movebankLogin(username = 'kaijagahm', password = pw)
rm(pw)

dat <- vultureUtils::downloadVultures(loginObject = MB.LoginObject, removeDup = T, dfConvert = T, quiet = T, dateTimeStartUTC = as.POSIXct("2020-01-01 00:00"), dateTimeEndUTC = as.POSIXct("2022-10-04 00:00"))
save(dat, file = "data/dat.Rda")
load("data/dat.Rda")
```
